title: National Briefing  Northwest: Oregon: Agents Seize 5 Stowaways
body:
Border patrol agents searching a grain ship anchored near Portland found five stowaways from China. The 
authorities charged two crew members with human trafficking, a spokesman for the Coast Guard said. Officials said 
the captain of the 620-foot Liberian-flag vessel, the Pacific Dolphin, had called the Coast Guard to say he might 
have stowaways aboard. The stowaways, all men, boarded on Jan. 13 in Dailan, China, officials said.

   Matthew Preusch (NYT)

http://www.nytimes.com
